prime.layout.LayoutClient

type
class
extends
prime.core.traits.Invalidatable
implements
ILayoutClient
subclasses
prime.layout.AdvancedLayoutClient
available in
swf
Base class for layout clients without implementing x, y, width and height.

Constructor

new(?newWidth : Int, ?newHeight : Int)

changes(default,null) : Int

Bitflag with all the changes that are done to the layout until it gets validated.

hasValidatedHeight(default,null) : Bool

Flag indicating wether validateVertical method is called after the height has been changed This flag has nothing to do with the method validateHeight //FIXME!

hasValidatedWidth(default,null) : Bool

Flag indicating wether validateHorizontal method is called after the width has been changed This flag has nothing to do with the method validateWidth //FIXME!

invalidate(change : Int) : Void

overrides prime.core.traits.Invalidatable
Method will set or unset the given propertyflag in the filledProperties property. Method will also call invalidate after that. FIXME: future thingy

invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : IInvalidatable) : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.Invalidatable

invalidateHorPaddingMargin() : Void

Method needs to get called when the horizontal padding or margin is changed This needs to be done manually since padding/margin don't accept change listeners.. Method will update the width of the client. If the client has a width of 100%, it will lower the value of the 'width' value.. otherwise it will increase the width of the outerBounds. FIXME

invalidateVerPaddingMargin() : Void

see
invalidateHorPaddingMargin

inline isChanged() : Bool

inline resetValidation() : Void

resize(newWidth : Int, newHeight : Int) : Void

Method will resize the LayoutClient. The aspectratio will be recalculated If maintainAspectRatio is set to true.

inline set_maxSize(maxWidth : Int, ?maxHeight : Int) : Void

inline set_minSize(minWidth : Int, ?minHeight : Int) : Void

updateAllHeights(v : Int, ?force : Bool) : Int

parameters
v new value for _height property
force Flag indicating that all properties should get updated, even though nothing has changed.
returns
the _height value
Method will change the value of the height property and the inner- and outerbounds to make sure they all have the same value. The given value will not be validated. Do not call this method directly! This will be done by setHeight who will also validate the value first.

updateAllWidths(v : Int, ?force : Bool) : Int

parameters
v new value for _width property
force Flag indicating that all properties should get updated, even though nothing has changed.
returns
the _width value
Method will change the value of the width property and the inner- and outerbounds to make sure they all have the same value. The given value will not be validated. Do not call this method directly! This will be done by setWidth who will also validate the value first.

validate() : Void

validateHeight(v : Int, options : Int) : Int

Method will validate the given value against the given validate-options. The method will try to make the new-height fit in

validateHorizontal() : Void

validateVertical() : Void

validateWidth(v : Int, options : Int) : Int

Method will validate the given value against the given validate-options. The method will try to make the new-width fit in

validated() : Void
